newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysian palm oil markets closed for holiday.
newsitem.headline: Malaysian palm oil markets closed for holiday.

text.p: Malaysian crude palmoil utures, physicals and palm kernel oil futures markets are closed today for a Molem religious holiday.
ON Wednesday, the Malaysian palm oil market extended its bearish trend but closed with small falls after shortcovering emerged due to a supportive crop report from Ivan Wong, traders said.
At the close, the contract dropped five ringgit to 1,265 ringgit ($503.48) after trading between 1,264 and 1,274 ringgit a tonne. Volume on the futures market was 1,966 lots traded.
